name: Color Field
description:
A game by Cflat, a group of students made up by Monge, Franzé and Rina.

Color Field is a minimalistic 2D game, in which players have to cooperate in order to complete the levels and progress to the next color. Every level has different aesthetics and mechanics, as well as possibly a deep meaning (or does it?).  

Submitted in the ITABits contest, on May 12th, 2019.
